ruleset.name: newrules
ruleset.description: These are new rules for the next release

rule.name: UnnecessaryFinalModifier
rule.message: Unnecessary final modifier in final class
rule.description: When a class has the final modifier, all the methods are marked finally.

rule.name: AbstractClassDoesNotContainAbstractMethod
rule.message: Class is defined abstract but it hasn't any abstract methods
rule.description: Abstract classes should have abstract methods, that are to be completed by subclasses. If the class is intended to not be instantiated, it should be done by providing private/protected constructors.
